edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.wordfilter
Class AbstractStopWordFilter

java.lang.Object
  edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.wordfilter.AbstractStopWordFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
WVTWordFilter, TokenEnumeration
Direct Known Subclasses:
CombinedWordFilter, DummyWordFilter, SelectingWordFilter, StopWordFilterFile, StopwordsCzech, StopwordsFrench, StopWordsWrapper, StopWordsWrapperGerman
public abstract class AbstractStopWordFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements WVTWordFilter, TokenEnumeration

Abstract call implementing basic functionality for several word filters.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Michael Wurst
